articles.title: Message of Sympathy to French FM
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to French FM
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Saturday sent a message of sympathy to Jean-Marc Ayrault, minister of Foreign Affairs and International Development of France, as regards the terrorist attack that claimed many casualties.
					 Expressing deep sympathy and consolations for the bereaved families of the victims, the message affirmed the stand of the DPRK to oppose all forms of terrorism. It hoped that the French government would recover from the damage of the attack as soon as possible.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Slams U.S.-S. Korea-Japan Confab
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Slams U.S.-S. Korea-Japan Confab
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Institute for American Studies of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA Sunday as regards the vice foreign ministers confab recently held by the U.S., Japan and south Korea in Hawaii.
					 As known, the U.S. is recently driving the situation on the Korean peninsula and in the region to the brink of a war by bringing nuclear submarines, strategic bombers and other nuclear strike means one after another to the vicinity of the peninsula.
					
					 Against this backdrop, the U.S. hosted what it called the fourth tripartite consultation with vice foreign ministers of Japan and south Korea in Hawaii on July 14.
					
					 At the confab the U.S. reaffirmed its commitment to steadily taking steps necessary for security of its allies, talking about "threat" from the DPRK, a stereotyped assertion.
					
					 It is not accidental that the confab was held in the place where a missile alert drill of the U.S., Japan and south Korea was staged shortly ago.
					
					 It is the long-cherished ambition of the U.S. to hold the military hegemony in the region by building a MD system on the Korean peninsula and in the region and knocking into shape the triangular military alliance.
					
					 The U.S. scenario to establish the MD system and the triangular military alliance are very risky as it will upset the regional strategic balance and build the structure of a new Cold War, which may lead to a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and in the region.
					
					 The U.S., which provided a foundation for establishing the MD system through a decision to deploy THAAD in south Korea, is going to buckle down to forging the triangular military alliance by tightening its control over its lackeys.
					
					 Openly revealed at the confab is the U.S. scenario to realize the wild ambition for seizing military hegemony in the region and the rest of the world at any cost.
					
					 The world should pay due attention to the situation on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia where the structure of a fresh Cold War is being created and the danger of a nuclear war is looming owing to the U.S. and its servants' conspiracy.
					
					 As already clarified, the DPRK will steadily take steps for bolstering up its self-defensive nuclear deterrent and carry out them on a higher level both in quality and quantity in order to completely remove the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and in other parts of Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.

articles.title: Koryo Medicine Output Goes Up in DPRK
articles.content:
Koryo Medicine Output Goes Up in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Koryo medicine (traditional Korean medicine) pharmaceutical factories in the DPRK are increasing their production in the on-going 200-day campaign.
					 The Phyongchon Koryo Medicine Pharmaceutical Factory in Pyongyang established 10-odd new production processes under its modernization plan while steadily improving the quality of medicines.
					
					 In recent one month, it raised the production of scores of kinds of medicines 1.6 times over the same period of last year.
					
					 The Sungho Koryo Medicine Pharmaceutical Factory updated its production processes to considerably raise the rate of extraction of essence from medicinal herbs and put the production on a higher level.
					
					 The Kaesong Disabled Soldiers' Koryo Medicine Pharmaceutical Factory has over-fulfilled its daily quota.
					
					 Similar successes were also reported from the Kanggye Koryo Medicine-processing Factory and Kusong, Yomju and Sepho Koryo medicine pharmaceutical factories.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un, Ever-victorious Brilliant Commander
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un, Ever-victorious Brilliant Commander
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Four years has passed since Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received the title of DPRK Marshal.
					 On the anniversary, the army and people of the DPRK pay the highest glory to him who is leading the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche to victory, true to the intention of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Over the past four years, they have keenly realized that Kim Jong Un is an ever-victorious and iron-willed brilliant commander as he has displayed the dignity and might of the great Paektusan nation to the full, with his rare military wisdom, distinguished commanding art and matchless pluck.
					
					 In Juche 102 (2013) when the enemies' reckless nuclear war exercises were at its height, he saw to it that a statement of the spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA) was issued to clarify the DPRK's tough stand. And he found himself all the year among the KPA units in the frontline areas, leading the overall showdown with the U.S. imperialists to victory.
					
					 And he repeatedly inspected the Jangjae Islet Defence Detachment and the Hero Defence Detachment on Mu Islet, the biggest hotspot, and guided the live-shell firing drills aimed at examining the capability to fight an actual war of KPA artillery subunits in charge of striking Yonphyong and Paekryong islands as well as landing and anti-landing drills of KPA large combined units.
					
					 In August 2015 when the U.S. was engaged in a nuclear strike exercise for an actual war, he inspiringly aroused all the servicepersons and civilians of the country to the confrontation against the U.S. with the toughest countermeasures.
					
					 And he issued an order of the KPA Supreme commander that the KPA frontline large combined units should enter a wartime state and the area along the front be put in a semi-war state.
					
					 Such counteractions led the touch-and-go situation on the Korean peninsula to pacification.
					
					 Thanks to his energetic guidance, the DPRK had access to H-bomb, ranking itself among the nuclear powers.
					
					 Its tremendous strength was well evidenced by the artillery firing contest of KPA large combined units, actual maneuvers between KPA large combined units, test-fire of newly developed anti-tank guided weapons and simulated test of atmospheric re-entry of ballistic rockets.

articles.title: U.S. Should Draw Lesson from Korean War
articles.content:
U.S. Should Draw Lesson from Korean War
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The United States is now intensifying its military movement to drive the situation of the Korean peninsula to an extreme.
					 Its strategic assets such as nuclear carrier task forces, nuclear-powered submarines and strategic bombers had already been deployed in south Korea and its vicinity. And the U.S. proper-based fighters recently flew to the Osan Air Force base in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. seems not to draw due lesson from the defeat it suffered in the 1950-1953 Korean War.
					
					 During the war, it mobilized all the famous military divisions and generals and employed every cruel war methods, but suffered a bitter defeat.
					
					 The U.S. "Smith commandos", an advance troop of the alleged "ever-victorious division", was annihilated at once by the powerful attack of the Korean People's Army (KPA) in Osan area. At that time, military experts and war correspondents described this as the "start of the U.S. troops' tragic defeat".
					
					 The defence line around Kumgang, which the U.S. forces called a "no retreat line" and "the last defence line", was broken down easily like a wet mud wall.
					
					 The U.S. 24th Division was encircled and destroyed in Taejon city and its commander was taken prisoner by a young soldier of the KPA.
					
					 Walker, commander of the U.S. 8th Army Corps, was killed in an ambush of a KPA unit.
					
					 MacArthur, Ridgway and Clark, commanders of the U.S. forces in the Far East and concurrently commanders of the "UN forces", gained disgrace of "defeated generals" in the war.
					
					 In the long run, the U.S. imperialists could not but sign a surrender document on July 27, 1953 after suffering a bitter defeat in the war against the young DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is well advised not to forget this defeat.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Rosy Future of DPRK under Great Brilliant Commander of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Rosy Future of DPRK under Great Brilliant Commander of Mt. Paektu 
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The conferment of the title of the DPRK Marshal on Kim Jong Il, the great Songun brilliant commander, on July 17, Juche 101 (2012) was an expression of the absolute trust and loyalty of the service personnel and people to him and a historic event guaranteeing the rosy future of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an editorial.
					 The conferment of the title of the DPRK Marshal on him made it possible to give steady continuity to the lineage of the Juche revolution, the Songun revolution, and more powerfully demonstrate the dignity and invincible spirit of the great Paektusan nation, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 Under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un the party, state and army of the DPRK have remarkably grown stronger to be the party, state and army of the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, and the  single-minded unity, the great foundation of the country, has been cemented as firm as a rock.
					
					 The DPRK is demonstrating its might as the invincible political and military power and the youth power without an equal in the world and eye-opening achievements have been made in building an economic giant and highly civilized power. This is a stirring reality which can be seen in socialist Korea only led by the peerlessly great man.
					
					 The rosy future of the great Paektusan nation and the final victory of the cause of the Juche revolution, the cause of the Songun revolution, lie in remaining loyal to the leadership of the Marshal. This is the unshakable faith of the service personnel and people of the DPRK who are dynamically stepping up the advance in the new century under his leadership.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Warmongers for Inciting Armed Conflict
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Warmongers for Inciting Armed Conflict
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Crying out for retaliating against "the north's provocation", the south Korean puppet military hooligans recently blustered they would set up ten more "anti-north" loudspeaker broadcasting facilities and double the number of mobile broadcasting vans operating in forefront areas by the end of the year.
					 Meanwhile, bosses of the puppet military examined "the combat posture" of the puppet army units on the five islands in the West Sea on July 11.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says that these reckless actions are driving the tense situation in the areas along the Military Demarcation Line and the hotspot waters of the West Sea into an unpredictably extreme phase.
					
					 It continues:
					
					 The prevailing situation proves that the warmongers have unhesitatingly set about adventurous military moves with areas along the MDL and hotspot waters of the West Sea as outposts.
					
					 Running high is the resentment of the service personnel and people of the DPRK at the Park Geun Hye regime escalating its reckless provocations against the DPRK.
					
					 There is a limit to its patience.
					
					 The puppet warmongers will never be able to go scot-free after getting frantic with anti-north saber-rattling, persistently challenging the north's sincere efforts for national reconciliation and unity, detente and peace.
					
					 We warn the south Korean warmongers once again not to gamble over the nation's destiny. Such foolish muscle flexing will entail irrevocable disastrous consequences.
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime would be well advised to stop its reckless action, well aware that its reckless military provocations are bringing disasters to south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Political Camp Falls into Confusion Due to Decision of THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Political Camp Falls into Confusion Due to Decision of THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- CBS and KBS of south Korea reported that the puppet political camp is falling into confusion due to the decision to deploy THAAD.
					 According to them, when Songju, North Kyongsang Province was decided as a location of THAAD and regional mindset against it is running high, lawmakers from Taegu and North Kyongsang Province changed their attitude though they styled themselves core forces supporting the Park Geun Hye regime at the April 13 election.
					
					 In a press conference and statements on July 13 they raised a problem in the course of the decision and demanded the regime take a step for regional compensation.
					
					 The Minju Party said that the authorities unilaterally decided to deploy THAAD without people's agreement.
					
					 The Kukmin Party set the opposition to THAAD deployment as its platform.

articles.title: S. Korean Opposition Party Discloses Injustice of Decision on THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
S. Korean Opposition Party Discloses Injustice of Decision on THAAD Deployment 
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The Kukmin Party, an opposition party of south Korea, disclosed the injustice of the decision on the THAAD deployment, according to the south Korean CBS.
					 At the meeting of the "National Assembly" on July 14, the floor leader of the party said that the whole course of making a decision on the THAAD deployment shows that it was the decision made by the incompetent regime by itself in the secret room in order to meet the interests of the U.S.
					
					 The chief spokesman for the party held that the THAAD deployment should not be decided without the consent of the people.
					
					 It is a contradictory action for Chongwadae to promote the self-justified policy without any consulation with the "National Assembly", he added.
					
					 He demanded the total retraction of the above-said decision.

articles.title: S. Korean Bodies Say No to THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
S. Korean Bodies Say No to THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- South Korean organizations released statements in denunciation of the U.S. and the Park Geun Hye regime's decision to deploy THAAD on July 13, according to south Korean online paper Tongil News.
					 The Youth and Students Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration demanded an immediate retraction of the decision to deploy THAAD in south Korea, noting it is only aimed to meet the U.S. interests, utterly indifferent to the security of the south Koreans.
					
					 Despite many experts' warning that THAAD, a good-for-nothing for the Korean peninsula, would bring again the era of the Cold War, the south Korean regime decided to deploy it, a clear indication that the regime prioritizes the stand of the U.S. rather than the security of people, it charged.
					
					 The Ansan Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration said the Park Geun Hye regime is escalating the danger of war on the Korean peninsula and threatening the life and security of people by deploying THAAD.
					
					 The decision is pursuant to the strategy of the U.S. to dominate Northeast Asia with south Korea as its shield, it added.
					
					 The Citizens' Solidarity for Peaceful Reunification strongly demanded the retraction of the decision, saying THAAD deployment would spark a nuclear arms race and public conflict and do harm to health and security of the people.

articles.title: Decision to Deploy THAAD Opposed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Decision to Deploy THAAD Opposed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Civic and social organizations in Inchon, south Korea held a press conference before the Inchon City Office on July 14 in protest against the U.S. and the puppet group's decision to deploy THAAD.
					  The organizations held that if THAAD is deployed, south Korea will be reduced to an outpost for defending the U.S. and Japan.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included round-table talks in Angola, reading session in Mali and Korean book exhibitions in China and Ghana on July 5 and 7.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the exhibitions were works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Present there were figures of various circles and masses in the relevant countries.
					
					 The general director of the Emproe Company of Angola and other speakers said that Kim Il Sung led the Korean revolution to victory, turned the DPRK into a powerful socialist country centered on the popular masses and positively supported the struggle of the peoples of many countries for achieving independence and building new society, thus making great contributions to accomplishing the cause of human independence.
					
					 They said that he was an outstanding statesman and the great leader who was recognized by the world as he was endowed with matchless political insight and extraordinary leadership ability.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings, Korean book and photo exhibitions and film shows took place in Venezuela, Switzerland and Nigeria from July 2 to 8 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and pictures and books introducing the struggle of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Korean films "Eternal Treasures in Praise of the Sun" and "Flag of Workers' Party of Korea" were shown.
					
					 The general coordinator of the Federal Secretariat of the United Left Party of Venezuela introduced in detail the immortal Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung, saying that he would be remembered by humankind along with the immortal Juche idea.
					
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, said Kim Il Sung worked heart and soul to achieve the country's reunification, the greatest desire of the Korean nation, till the last moments of his great life.
					
					 The three principles of national reunification, the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation advanced by Kim Il Sung reflect his spirit of national independence and love for the country and nation, the chairman added.

articles.title: German Media Praise Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
German Media Praise Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- German newspapers and websites carried special write-ups on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The July issue of the newspaper Rote Fahne carried an article titled "Comrade Kim Il Sung, great man of the century" illustrated with the portrait of the smiling President.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 The history of mankind has recorded a lot of great men but there is no such a man as President Kim Il Sung who enjoys boundless reverence of all people down through generations. 
					
					 He is the explorer and pioneer in the era of independence who founded the Juche idea to indicate the way of mankind.
					
					 The Juche idea makes it possible for humankind to break the darkness of thousands of years, greet a new era of independence and dynamically advance toward global independence.
					
					 He is the outstanding elder statesman of the world who led the cause of human independence, holding aloft the banner of independence against imperialism all his life.
					
					 He is a peerless sage who moved the world with his human love and virtue.
					
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on July 6 posted on its website photos documenting his revolutionary career and exploits.
					
					 The German Group for the Study of Korean Culture carried an article titled "Benevolent father of people" on the website of the MS Travel Company, illustrated with his photo.
					
					 The article said that he provided on-the-spot guidance for the happiness of the people all his life.

articles.title: Special Lecture on DPRK Given in Peru
articles.content:
Special Lecture on DPRK Given in Peru
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- A special lecture on the theme of "Reality of the DPRK and recent situation on Korean peninsula" was given in Arequipa Province, Peru on June 9.
					 Displayed at the venue of the lecture were works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Leopoldo Ortiz Centty, executive member and general secretary of the Port Trade Union of the Peruvian General Federation of Workers, said in a lecture that the DPRK is indeed a great and powerful country of the people and the country where the working class is the master of society and everything serves the people.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Witnessing the reality in which the leader pursues the politics for the people and the people remain loyal to the leader, I think that we should learn from the Korean people.
					
					 Seeing all the service personnel and people get united to defend the country and work hard in the worksites for building socialism, I admired that there is no such a country.
					
					 The U.S. and the West are slandering the DPRK but the Korean people are bolstering up the defence capabilities to safeguard the sovereignty of the country and nation.
					
					 He referred to the noble mental and moral traits of the Korean people he saw by himself during his visit to the DPRK.
					
					 He expressed his will to make positive efforts for the friendship and solidarity between the peoples of the two countries, with the boundless reverence for the great leaders of the DPRK.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Censure S. Korean Regime for Escalating Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Censure S. Korean Regime for Escalating Confrontation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on July 11 denouncing the south Korean Park Geun Hye regime for escalating confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					 Recalling Park pulled up the DPRK, talking about its "possibility of terrorism", the statement said:
					
					 Park, at a "state council meeting" at Chongwadae on July 4, spouted rubbish that the north is attempting a variety of terrorism to cause a conflict among southerners.  
					
					 Earlier, the "prime minister" of south Korea talked nonsense that there is concern that the north may kidnap south Koreans abroad or commit terrorism by instigating an international terrorist group.
					
					 This is hypocritical and shameless as the south Korean regime masterminded the group allurement and abduction of DPRK citizens in broad daylight.
					
					 As reported, the DPRK is firmly opposed to all forms of terrorism.
					
					 Park's rubbish is groundless.
					
					 The south Korean authorities not only masterminded the group abduction of DPRK citizens but also insulted the dignity and social system of the DPRK, organized hideous terrorists groups like the "association for bringing down statues" and infiltrated human scum into the DPRK in a bid to bring down it.
					
					 Park's reckless behavior is the height of impudence.

articles.title: IAN de MINREX revela intento de EE.UU. en cuarta consulta tripartita de vicecancilleres
articles.content:
IAN de MINREX revela intento de EE.UU. en cuarta consulta tripartita de vicecancilleres
Pyongyang, 17 de julio (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que se efectuo recientemente en Hawai, Estados Unidos, la consulta tripartita a nivel de vicecanciller entre EE.UU., Japon y el Sur de Corea, el portavoz del Instituto para Asuntos Norteamericanos (IAN) del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 17 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					Como esta conocido por todos, en los ultimos dias EE.UU. introduce sucesivamente los medios de ataque nuclear incluso los submarinos nucleares y los bombarderos estrategicos, llevando al borde de la guerra la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de la region. 
					
					En tal circunstancia, llamo el dia 14 a Japon y los titeres surcoreanos a Hawai y convoco la cuarta consulta tripartita de viceministros de Relaciones Exteriores. 
					
					Infaliblemente, en esta cita tambien EE.UU. prometio que seguira tomando las medidas necesarias a la seguridad de sus lacayos pretextando la "amenaza" de la RPDC. 
					
					No es casual que el presente debate se haya efectuado en la zona donde esos tres paises acabaron de realizar los ejercicios de alarma de misil. 
					
					Ya desde hace mucho tiempo, EE.UU. perseguia la ambicion de garantizar la hegemonia militar en la region mediante el establecimiento del sistema de defensa antimisil y la fabricacion de la alianza militar tripartita en la Peninsula Coreana y la region.
					
					Este intento deviene un acto peligroso que puede destruir el equilibrio estrategico de la region, formar la estructura de nueva guerra fria y causar la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana y la region.
					
					EE.UU. ya preparo el fundamento favorable al establecimiento del sistema antimisiles mediante la resolucion por el emplazamiento de THAAD en el suelo surcoreano y ahora se desespera por fabricar la alianza militar tripartita atrayendo mas a sus lacayos. 
					
					La presente cita tripartita sirvio del motivo en que el imperio revelo abiertamente su intento de lograr a toda costa la hegemonia militar sobre la region y el mundo entero. 
					
					El mundo debe prestar una atencion debida a la evolucion de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico donde se forma la estructura de nueva guerra fria y se crea el peligro de la guerra nuclear debido a los complots de EE.UU. y sus lacayos. 
					
					Como ya hemos aclarado, tomaremos de continuo las medidas para fortalecer el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa y las practicaremos en el nivel mas alto en lo cualitativo y cuantitativo para eliminar de raiz el peligro de guerra nuclear en el Nordeste Asiatico incluso la Peninsula Coreana y en ambito mundial.
